MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Walthall St, Nantwich Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:11AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties locating the source of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:16PM on 16th January 2021.
